verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A farmers daughter was walkin' alone Oh but her Robert was easy won When she heard a Scots prisoner makin' along Oh and she was the flower of Northumberland

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: An' it's all if a lassie would listen to me Oh but her Robert was easy won I would make her a Lady of high degree If she'd loosen me out of this prison so strong

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Then she's hastened away to her father's back stock Oh but her Robert was easy won She has taken the keys to many a good lock And she's loosened him out of his prison so strong

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: She's hastened away to her father's stable Oh but her Robert was easy won She has taken a horse that was both fleet and able To carry them both to bonny Scotland

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: As they were a ridin' across the Scots moor He said Oh but your Robert was easy won Get down from the horse you're a brazen faced whore For now you're the flower of Northumberland

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: For as I have a wife in my own country Oh but your Robert was easy won I no have the time for a lassie like thee Oh now you're the flower of Northumberland

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: It's a cook in your kitchen I surely will be Oh but my Robert was easy won I'd serve your Lady most reverently For I dare not go back to Northumberland

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: It's a cook in my kitchen ya canna well be Oh but your Robert was easy won For my Lady she would na' have servants like thee So go get ye back to Northumberland

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Oh but loath was he the lassie to leave Oh but her Robert was easy won So he's hired a long horse and he's paid in our blood To carry her back to Northumberland

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: And when she got in her father did frown Oh but your Robert was easy won To be a Scots whore when you're fifteen years old And you were the flower of Northumberland

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: But when she got in her father did smile Oh but your Robert was easy won And you're not the first lass that the Scots have beguiled And you still are the flower of Northumberland

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: And you will not want bread and you will not want wine Oh though your Robert was easy won And you will not want silver to buy you a man And you still are the flower of Northumberland
